identity.mission: Create a top 1% IPTV streaming interface that blends cinematic immersion with functional clarity.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix TV broadcast aesthetics with modern SaaS dashboard precision.
Emotion First: The interface should feel 'live' and 'electric'.
Content is King: The UI recedes; the video content pops.
Zoom In: Large, bold focus states for remote-friendly navigation.
Negative Space: Avoid clutter; let the background breathe.

design_context.target_audience: Cord-cutters and IPTV enthusiasts who value speed and visual fidelity.
design_context.visual_style: Modern TV Interface (Apple TV meets Cyberpunk Dashboard). Dark Blue gradients, Glassmorphism, Glowing accents.

gradients.main_bg: radial-gradient(circle at top right, hsl(220, 60%, 10%), hsl(224, 71%, 4%))

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (p-6 to p-12) to accommodate TV overscan and visual breathing room.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(6,182,212,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: rounded-xl bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300
buttons.square_utility: aspect-square rounded-xl bg-card/50 hover:bg-primary/20 border border-white/5 hover:border-primary flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-2 transition-all duration-300

cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-white/5 bg-card/40 transition-all duration-500 hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(6,182,212,0.15)]

navigation.style: Remote-friendly. Large touch targets. Clear focus states (ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 ring-offset-background).

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl and bg-white/5 for overlays and sidebars.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use drop-shadow and box-shadow with the primary cyan color to simulate neon lights.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to prevent banding on large dark gradients.
visual_enhancers.motion: Framer Motion for smooth layout transitions. 'layout' prop for shared element transitions.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use large stroke widths (2px or 2.5px) for TV legibility.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' and 'index.css' with the provided color palette immediately. Force Dark Mode.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Home Dashboard' first. It must look like a TV Launcher. Use a CSS Grid.
4. COMPONENTS: Create a reusable 'FocusCard' component that handles the hover/focus scaling and glowing border effect.
5. NAVIGATION: Ensure the 'Search', 'Parental', 'REC', 'MSG', 'Update' icons are at the top right.
6. SECTIONS: Create the main oval buttons for 'Live TV', 'EPG', 'VOD', 'Series' in the center/hero area.
7. FOOTER: Create the square buttons for 'Account', 'Multi', 'Catch Up', 'Favorite', 'Radio', 'Settings' at the bottom.
8. MOCK DATA: Since there is no backend auth, use local state or context to manage a mock 'M3U Playlist' list.
9. PLAYER: Use a standard HTML5 video tag or a React wrapper for the Live TV player mock.
10. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large display title.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use the deep blue provided.
Ensure focus states are extremely visible (for keyboard/remote navigation).
